com.jgefroh.core
Interface IInfoPackFactory

public interface IInfoPackFactory

Interface for the InfoPackFactory.

The InfoPackFactory is used by Core to generate InfoPacks for an Entity that has the proper components.

Since:
20MAY13
Version:
0.1.0
Author:
Joseph Gefroh

Method Summary
<T extends IInfoPack>
T
generate(IEntity entity)
          Create an InfoPack based on the components the passed Entity has.
 

Method Detail

generate

<T extends IInfoPack> T generate(IEntity entity)
Create an InfoPack based on the components the passed Entity has.

Core will automatically call this method when it begins tracking an Entity or when it notices that an Entity has changed.

Parameters:
entity - the entity for which this InfoPack is being generated
Returns:
the generated InfoPack
Since:
0.1.0
